filterParam.name: geographic_region_prism
filterParam.help: Select observations based on the subcounty where the participant lives.

filterParam.name: visits_visitage_metadata_prism
filterParam.help: Select the age of the participants at the time of their clinical observations.

filterParam.name: participants_prism
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: households_prism
filterParam.help: Select observations based on the household characteristics where the participant lives.

filterParam.name: visits_prism
filterParam.help: Select observations based on their observation characteristics.

dateRangeParam.name: visit_date
dateRangeParam.help: "select the earliest and latest dates to include for identifying observations and computing mosquito counts."

numberRangeParam.name: num_relative_events
numberRangeParam.help: Set the range of the number of matching observations in order to keep or remove the observation from the previous step.

numberRangeParam.name: days_between
numberRangeParam.help: Set the range of days between observations to compare to observations selected in the previous step

enumParam.name: dateOperator
enumParam.help: Choose how to compare these two observations. Do you want to remove observations that have another observation within the specified time frame or keep them.

enumParam.name: date_direction
enumParam.help: Choose a direction for the corresponding observation. Will the matching observation be before or after relative to the first observation.

flatVocabParam.name: use_relative_visits
flatVocabParam.help: You MUST change this parameter to Yes in order to use relative observations! If you decide to not use relative observations, set this parameter to No and make certain "Keep or remove observations" is set to remove.

flatVocabParam.name: dateOperator_fv
flatVocabParam.prompt: Keep or Remove observations from previous step matching these criteria
flatVocabParam.help: Choose how to compare these two observations. Do you want to remove observations that have another observation within the specified time frame or keep them.

flatVocabParam.name: date_direction_fv
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a direction for the corresponding observation. Will the matching observation be before or after relative to the first observation.

filterParam.name: geographic_region_maled
filterParam.help: Select observations based on the participants subcounty where they live.

filterParam.name: households_maled
filterParam.help: Select observations based on the characteristics of the household where the participants live.

filterParam.name: participants_maled
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: visits_maled
filterParam.help: Select observations based on their observation characteristics.

filterParam.name: relative_visits_maled
filterParam.help: Select related observations based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: relative_visits_sasia
filterParam.help: Select related observations based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: geographic_region_india
filterParam.help: Select observations based on geographic region where the participants live.

filterParam.name: households_india
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their geographic region.

filterParam.name: participants_india
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: visits_india
filterParam.help: Select observations based on their observation characteristics.

filterParam.name: relative_visits_india
filterParam.help: Select related observations based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: geographic_region_amazperu
filterParam.help: Select observations based on geographic region where the participants live.

filterParam.name: households_amazperu
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their geographic region.

filterParam.name: participants_amazperu
filterParam.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParam.name: visits_amazperu
filterParam.help: Select observations based on their observation characteristics.

filterParam.name: relative_visits_amazperu
filterParam.help: Select related observations based on their characteristics.

sqlQuery.name: dateDirection
sqlQuery.sql: select * from ( SELECT 'after' as term, '>=' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'before' as term, '<=' as internal from dual) order by term desc

sqlQuery.name: dateOperator
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT * from ( SELECT 'Remove' as display, 'remove' as term, 'MINUS' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Keep' as display, 'keep' as term, 'INTERSECT' as internal from dual where $$use_relative_visits$$ = 1 ) ORDER by term desc

sqlQuery.name: useRelativeVisits
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'No' as term, 0 as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Yes' as term, 1 as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct p.household_id as filter_item_id, ho.observation_id as internal, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseObsIO ho where p.ontology_term_name = 'EUPATH_0000054' and ho.household_id = p.household_id

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.observation_id as internal, m.ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD m where m.observation_id in ($$geographic_region_prism$$) and m.ontology_term_name = 'EUPATH_0000113'

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as household_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id, iov.output_pan_id as obs_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO iov where io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_pan_id = iov.input_pan_id and iov.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738' and iov.output_pan_id in ($$participants_prism$$) ) select distinct m.pan_id as filter_item_id, part.obs_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, part where part.household_id = m.pan_id union all select part.household_id as filter_item_id, part.obs_id as internal, 'average_anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.pan_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id and EUPATH_0020003 >= $$visit_date.min$$ and EUPATH_0020003 <= $$visit_date.max$$ group by da.pan_id) mos, part where part.household_id = mos.pan_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct io.input_pan_id as household_id, io.output_pan_id as part_id, iov.output_pan_id as obs_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO iov where io.input_pan_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_pan_id = iov.input_pan_id and iov.output_pan_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738' ) select distinct m.pan_id as filter_item_id, part.obs_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, part where part.household_id = m.pan_id union all select part.household_id as filter_item_id, part.obs_id as internal, 'average_anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.pan_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Households da, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PANIO io, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$LightTraps la where da.pan_id = io.input_pan_id and la.pan_id = io.output_pan_id group by da.pan_id) mos, part where part.household_id = mos.pan_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as filter_item_id, iov.observation_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from (select min(EUPATH_0000113) as min_age, max(EUPATH_0000113) as max_age from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Observations where pan_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_prism$$) ) age, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Participants pa, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO iov, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Observations obs where least(pa.EUPATH_0000152, $$visit_date.max$$, pa.EFO_0004950 + ( age.max_age * 365)) - greatest(pa.EUPATH_0000151, $$visit_date.min$$, pa.EFO_0004950 + ( age.min_age * 365)) + 1 >= $$duration_observation$$ and pa.pan_id = iov.participant_id and iov.observation_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_prism$$) and iov.observation_id = obs.pan_id and obs.EUPATH_0000091 >= $$visit_date.min$$ and obs.EUPATH_0000091 <= $$visit_date.max$$ and pa.pan_id = m.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.pan_id as filter_item_id, iov.observation_id as internal, m.property_source_id as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO iov, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$MetaData m where iov.participant_id = m.pan_id

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_prism
sqlQuery.sql: select m.observation_id as internal, m.ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD m where m.observation_id in ($$households_prism$$)

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select p.household_id as internal, ho.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseObsIO ho where p.ontology_term_name = 'OBI_0001627' and ho.household_id = p.household_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select h.household_id as internal, h.household_observation_id as filter_item_id, ho.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseObsIO ho where h.household_id in ($$geographic_region_maled$$) and ho.household_id = h.household_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select h.household_id as internal, h.household_observation_id as filter_item_id, ho.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseObsIO ho where ho.household_id = h.household_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select p.participant_id as internal, hp.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO hp where p.household_id in ($$households_maled$$) and hp.participant_id = p.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select p.participant_id as internal, hp.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO hp where hp.participant_id = p.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, observation_id as filter_item_id, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD where participant_id in ($$participants_maled$$)

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, observation_id as filter_item_id, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData_sasia
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select h.household_observation_id as filter_item_id, hp.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HousePartIO hp, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where hp.household_id in ($$geographic_region_india$$) and hp.household_id = h.household_id and hp.participant_id = po.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_india
sqlQuery.sql: select h.household_observation_id as filter_item_id, hp.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HousePartIO hp, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where hp.household_id = h.household_id and hp.participant_id = po.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select p.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where p.participant_id in ($$households_india$$) and po.participant_id = p.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_india
sqlQuery.sql: select p.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where po.participant_id = p.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD where participant_id in ($$participants_india$$)

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct h.household_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HousePartIO hp, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where h.ontology_term_name in (select ontology_term_source_id from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$Ontology o CONNECT BY o.parent_ontology_term_source_id = PRIOR o.ontology_term_source_id START WITH o.ontology_term_source_id = 'GAZ_00000448') and hp.household_id = h.household_id and hp.participant_id = po.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData_india
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaData_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select h.household_id as filter_item_id, hp.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HousePartIO hp, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where hp.participant_id in ($$geographic_region_amazperu$$) and hp.household_id = h.household_id and hp.participant_id = po.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: HouseholdMetaDataBkgd_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select h.household_id as filter_item_id, hp.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HousePartIO hp, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where hp.household_id = h.household_id and hp.participant_id = po.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select p.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where p.participant_id in ($$households_amazperu$$) and po.participant_id = p.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select p.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, p.ontology_term_name, p.string_value, p.number_value, p.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ParticipantMD p, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where po.participant_id = p.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD where participant_id in ($$participants_amazperu$$)

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct h.household_id as filter_item_id, hp.participant_id as internal, po.observation_id as record_id, h.ontology_term_name, h.string_value, h.number_value, h.date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HouseholdMD h, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$HousePartIO hp, ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$PartObsIO po where h.ontology_term_name in ('EUPATH_0022001','EUPATH_0021094') and hp.household_id = h.household_id and hp.participant_id = po.participant_id

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData_amazperu
sqlQuery.sql: select observation_id as internal, ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from ApidbTuning.$$tbl_prefix$$ObservationMD
